pkgmetadata.longdescription: InPAS: a bioconductor package for the identification of novel alternative PolyAdenylation Sites (PAS) using RNA-seq data // Alternative polyadenylation (APA) is one of the important post- transcriptional regulation mechanisms which occurs in most human genes. InPAS facilitates the discovery of novel APA sites and the differential usage of APA sites from RNA-Seq data. It leverages cleanUpdTSeq to fine tune identified APA sites by removing false sites due to internal-priming.
